title: You’ll Never Keep Clients If You Don’t Get This Right with Tony Banta - The Client Whisperer
itunes:title: You’ll Never Keep Clients If You Don’t Get This Right with Tony Banta - The Client Whisperer
description:
What's your entrepreneurial skill set? Are you a technician, or more of a visionary? No matter which category you fall into, you can't help your people if you can't lead them well.
 
Tony Banta knows what very few of us can really see: everything in life is a system. And it's that knowledge, along with a few other unique ingredients, that have earned him the title of The Client Whisperer. Along with his wife Suzanne, Tony helps service-based businesses refine their leadership component to provide value on an entirely new level.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Tony and Zach trade insights on the vital importance of taking ownership as a leader, why clients leave your service (and what you can do to prevent that), and how to access the literal roadmap for successfully leading even the toughest clients. Listen in to give your people more than just the latest systems.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/tony-banta/
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://www.podcastpenthouse.com/roadmaps/
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
